members.name: Silvia Farina
members.bio: "I am a sculptor and visual artist. In my work, I explore forms of forest and other animal life, as well as trees and creatures with which I feel a deep connection. For Saba, I work as a designer and decorator, also handling firings and marketing."

members.name: Giulio Galamini
members.bio: "Ceramicist by passion, I handle design, creation, and branding. On the potterâ€™s wheel, I experiment with textures and special firings like Raku and Saggar, seeking unique, timeless, and authentic forms."
